description.en: Collecting goodies is much faster than relying on those elves to make everything!
description.ar: Collecting goodies is much faster than relying on those elves to make everything!
description.br: Ajudantes criados pelo Papai Noel a sua imagem e semelhança para ajudar coletar itens.
description.cns: 收集糖果比依靠那些精灵制造一切要快得多！
description.de: Ein kleiner Weihnachtsmann, der dir überall hin folgt und Gegenstände für dich aufsammelt.
description.fi: Collecting goodies is much faster than relying on those elves to make everything!
description.fil: Collecting goodies is much faster than relying on those elves to make everything!
description.fr: invoque un petit Père noël qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis
description.id: Mengumpulkan item drop lebih cepat denganku daripada mengandalkan para elf itu!
description.it: Collecting goodies is much faster than relying on those elves to make everything!
description.jp: クリスマスサンタを召喚・帰還させることができます。
description.kr: 크리스마스 산트클로스를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: Collecting goodies is much faster than relying on those elves to make everything!
description.pl: Collecting goodies is much faster than relying on those elves to make everything!
description.ru: Какая сноровка! А вы верили, что за Санту всю работу делают помощники-эльфы?
description.sp: ¡Recolectar golosinas es mucho más rápido que confiar en esos elfos para hacer todo!
description.sw: Collecting goodies is much faster than relying on those elves to make everything!
description.th: การรวบรวมสารพัดนั้นเร็วกว่าการพึ่งพาเอลฟ์เหล่านั้นเพื่อทำทุกอย่าง!
description.tw: 召喚或是解除迷你聖誕老人。召喚時，會自動撿取周邊的物品。
description.vi: Thu thập quà tặng nhanh hơn nhiều so với việc dựa vào những chú lùn đó để làm mọi thứ!
